md:
giải nghĩa từ "prepositional" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Above (preposition) - Trên, phía trên
	* Meaning: Located higher than something else.
	* Example: The picture is above the sofa.
	* Related words: over, on top of, higher than
2. Across (preposition) - Xuyên qua, ngang qua
	* Meaning: From one side to the other side of something.
	* Example: The bridge goes across the river.
	* Related words: over, through, from one side to another
3. Against (preposition) - Đối với, chống lại
	* Meaning: In opposition to something or someone.
	* Example: The team played against their rivals.
	* Related words: opposite, versus, in opposition to
4. Along (preposition) - Dọc theo, theo chiều
	* Meaning: Moving or extending in a line next to something.
	* Example: The road runs along the coast.
	* Related words: beside, next to, parallel to
5. Among (preposition) - Trong số, giữa
	* Meaning: Located in the middle of a group of people or things.
	* Example: The treasure was hidden among the trees.
	* Related words: in the middle of, surrounded by, amidst
6. Around (preposition) - Xung quanh, quanh
	* Meaning: Moving or located in a circle or on all sides of something.
	* Example: The kids are playing around the park.
	* Related words: surrounding, encircling, circular
7. At (preposition) - Ở, tại
	* Meaning: Located at a specific place or time.
	* Example: I'll meet you at the station at 5pm.
	* Related words: in, on, by
8. Below (preposition) - Dưới, phía dưới
	* Meaning: Located lower than something else.
	* Example: The basement is below the ground floor.
	* Related words: under, underneath, lower than
9. Beside (preposition) - Bên cạnh, cạnh
	* Meaning: Located next to something or someone.
	* Example: The hotel is beside the beach.
	* Related words: next to, adjacent to, alongside
10. Between (preposition) - Giữa, giữa
	* Meaning: Located in the middle of two or more things.
	* Example: The city is between two mountains.
	* Related words: among, amidst, in the middle of

Note: Some prepositions can have multiple meanings and uses, and some meanings may overlap with other prepositions. This is not an exhaustive list, and there are many more prepositions in English.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "prepositional" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Above (preposition) - Trên, phía trên
    • Meaning: Located higher than something else.
    • Example: The picture is above the sofa.
    • Related words: over, on top of, higher than
  2. Across (preposition) - Xuyên qua, ngang qua
    • Meaning: From one side to the other side of something.
    • Example: The bridge goes across the river.
    • Related words: over, through, from one side to another
  3. Against (preposition) - Đối với, chống lại
    • Meaning: In opposition to something or someone.
    • Example: The team played against their rivals.
    • Related words: opposite, versus, in opposition to
  4. Along (preposition) - Dọc theo, theo chiều
    • Meaning: Moving or extending in a line next to something.
    • Example: The road runs along the coast.
    • Related words: beside, next to, parallel to
  5. Among (preposition) - Trong số, giữa
    • Meaning: Located in the middle of a group of people or things.
    • Example: The treasure was hidden among the trees.
    • Related words: in the middle of, surrounded by, amidst
  6. Around (preposition) - Xung quanh, quanh
    • Meaning: Moving or located in a circle or on all sides of something.
    • Example: The kids are playing around the park.
    • Related words: surrounding, encircling, circular
  7. At (preposition) - Ở, tại
    • Meaning: Located at a specific place or time.
    • Example: I'll meet you at the station at 5pm.
    • Related words: in, on, by
  8. Below (preposition) - Dưới, phía dưới
    • Meaning: Located lower than something else.
    • Example: The basement is below the ground floor.
    • Related words: under, underneath, lower than
  9. Beside (preposition) - Bên cạnh, cạnh
    • Meaning: Located next to something or someone.
    • Example: The hotel is beside the beach.
    • Related words: next to, adjacent to, alongside
  10. Between (preposition) - Giữa, giữa
    • Meaning: Located in the middle of two or more things.
    • Example: The city is between two mountains.
    • Related words: among, amidst, in the middle of

Note: Some prepositions can have multiple meanings and uses, and some meanings may overlap with other prepositions. This is not an exhaustive list, and there are many more prepositions in English.
